items.content_html: A lightweight web app for finding high-quality images quickly. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it integrates the Pexels API for seamless image search. Features include efficient keyword search, curated collections, pagination, and direct image downloads. Explore diverse images with ease.
items.title: akmadd/js_based_Image_search_app: A lightweight web app for finding high-quality images quickly. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it integrates the Pexels API for seamless image search. Features include efficient keyword search, curated collections, pagination, and direct image downloads. Explore diverse images with ease.
